channel.title: 562 coding help
channel.description: i just started coding a 562 and i cant figure out a few things... can someone tell me how to change what it says when you first log on (ex. Welcome to ____Scape owner and coder is ___) [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww9/xxUNReaLL/562.jpg[/img] and also when my client is loading up it says connecting to painzone<-(client i downloaded)...how do i change that to the name of my server? if you have any tips of how to please help meh :D thanx [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww9/xxUNReaLL/562a.jpg[/img]

item.title: 562 coding help
item.dc:creator: @chaos_666 chaos 666
item.description:
@chaos_666 wrote:

Like iloob said: I posted the “tut” ( I feel like I shouldn’t refer to it like that ) here’s the link; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449382.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: 562 coding help
item.dc:creator: @iloob iloob
item.description:
@iloob wrote:

To change the regular message go to data > scripts then open authentication.py and the message should be noticable.

To change the “PainZone is loading” go to your client files open up the src folder then open Class184.java and should be like line 11 where it says that.

To change the “Checking or PainZone is online!” go to your client files open up the src folder then open Class192.java and should be like line 13 where it says that too.

Read full topic

item.title: 562 coding help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

go to your client sided of your folder and search for the the name “PloxPk” -> you should get some files that come up, go into each of them and search “PloxPk” -> until you find where it says “plox pk client by tyler” and there you can change it.

Read full topic

the welcome to bit you can edit in the administrator.py or entity.java file
